metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8597 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
eap.c in pppd in ppp 2.4.2 through 2.4.8 has an rhostname buffer overflow in the eap_request and eap_response functions.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-8597` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblwip0 - 2.1.2+dfsg1-6
No subscription required

ppp - 2.4.7-2+4.1ubuntu5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lwip package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.2+dfsg1-6').
ppp package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.7-2+4.1ubuntu5').
